Key.Original:
Greetings %1!
Thank you for adding 9Liners & Notepad to your arsenal of crazy mods.
This mod has recently undergone a complete re-write. There are now unlimited pages, amongst other amazing things. Unfortunately this means that all your notes have been deleted. We apologise for any previous notes being lost. However, we hope you love 9Liners & Notepad as much as we have loved working on it!
Enjoy!
TheMysteriousVincent and Arend
Key.English:
Greetings %1!
Thank you for adding 9Liners & Notepad to your arsenal of crazy mods.
This mod has recently undergone a complete re-write. There are now unlimited pages, amongst other amazing things. Unfortunately this means that all your notes have been deleted. We apologise for any previous notes being lost. However, we hope you love 9Liners & Notepad as much as we have loved working on it!
Enjoy!
TheMysteriousVincent and Arend
Key.German:
Grüsse %1!
Vielen dank das ihr 9Liners & Notizbuch herunter geladen habt.
Dieser Mod hat neuerdings eine komplette umarbeitung unterzogen. Es gibt jezt unendliche Seiten, unter andere geniale dinge. Leider meint das dass alle euren alter Notizen waren jezt gelöscht. Wir enschuldigen uns für irgendwelche verlorene Notizen. Aber, wir hoffen das ihr 9Liners & Notepad liebt, so wie wir es geliebt haben, daran zu arbeiten!
Tschüss!
TheMysteriousVincent and Arend

Key.Original: Enable background window after closing edit fields
Key.English: Enable background window after closing edit fields
Key.German: Hintergrundfenster nach dem Schliessen der Eingabefelder aktivieren

Key.Original: You got a new page from %1.
Key.English: You got a new page from %1.
Key.German: Ihr kriegt eine neue Seite von %1.

Key.Original: All pages where cleared and saved.
Key.English: All pages where cleared and saved.

Key.Original: Page %1 cleared\nNote: The page was cleared, but not saved!
Key.English: Page %1 cleared\nNote: The page was cleared, but not saved!
Key.German: Seite %1 wurde entfernt\nHinweis: Die Seite wurde entfernt, aber nicht gespeichert!
Du hast keine Seiten mehr übrig.

Key.Original: This page does not exist anymore.
Key.English: This page does not exist anymore.

Key.Original: You have to close the current sheet first.
Key.English: You have to close the current sheet first.
Key.German: Du musst das Blatt vorher schließen.

Key.Original: Click: Enable Controls | Dbl Click: Close
Key.English: Click: Enable Controls | Dbl Click: Close
